Name: RollingSky2
About the game: As a sequel to a world renowned rhythm game “Rolling sky”, Rolling sky2 is a game where you can easily initiate an incredibly marvelous adventure by simple finger movements. Featuring challenging missions yet beginner-friendly gaming experience, the game is also a combination of anime movie and top-notch original soundtrack which will definitely get you hooked! 【How to play】 Tap the screen with the rhythm of music to avoid various objects. 【Features】 ●A playable anime movie with magical journey stimulating both visual and auditory sensation. ●Original soundtracks ●Beginner-friendly and suitable for all players of different levels ●Unique missions and gaming rules combine with abundant stories and music
